Container.Name: DHCP Netboot
Container.Overview: This Docker container lets you PXE boot a bunch of installers and utilities on your local network, without much mucking about configuring DHCP and TFTP servers, using the excellent netboot.xyz project.
Container.ExtraSearchTerms: network boot pxe iso utilities installer dhcp tftp
Container.Requires: This container runs on the host network. Please read the documentation: https://github.com/samdbmg/dhcp-netboot.xyz#option-1-running-it-directly

Config.Name: DHCP Range Start
Config.Description: Start of the DHCP range for PXE booting. This should be in the same subnet as your Unraid server.
